title: AI-Enhanced Digital Citizenship Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Essential Digital Literacy and Online Communication Experience
context.additional_context: Personalized game-based learning environments utilizing personal devices. Experiencing digital ethics dilemmas similar to real-life situations through VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can apply ethical decision-making processes in digital environments with ≥85% accuracy.
Learners can propose critical thinking-based solutions in at least three types of online conflict scenarios.
Learners maintain ≥70% sustained motivation indicators over four weeks and develop action plans for practicing digital citizenship.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
